msbt.message: Wait, you're telling me I actually had FLEAS?! EWWW!You won't think less of me for this will you? Honestly, I wouldn't blame you if you did.
I can't believe I had actual fleas on my body.Don't they know I lather up my hair with & Premium Shampoo?
Oh, I'm so glad it was you who got those fleas off of me.What if it had been Tom Nook? Or, likemy mom?! I could never live that down.
